title: Paris Jackson and boyfriend Gabriel Glenn dress as Scooby-Doo and Shaggy
text:
They've been together since April 2018.

And Paris Jackson and her rocker boyfriend Gabriel Glenn looked perfectly in-sync as they enjoyed a night out at Paris Hilton's Halloween party at a private residence in Beverly Hills on Thursday.

The model and actress, 21, displayed her playful side as she got into character as Scooby-Doo as she arrived at the venue on the arm of her musician beau, who dressed as Shaggy for the occasion.

Cute couple: Paris Jackson and her rocker boyfriend Gabriel Glenn looked perfectly in-sync as they enjoyed a night out at Paris Hilton's Halloween party in Beverly Hills on Thursday

Paris - the daughter of late pop icon Michael Jackson - donned a flowing layered skirt, heeled boots and a long-sleeved crop top.

She accessorised with necklaces of various lengths and clipped a belt on to her skirt which featured a pouch for small items.

A brown backpack, which she wore slung over one shoulder, held her larger belongings.

Paris wore her brunette hair in freshly blow-dried curls and black paint was applied to her nose to recreate the look of a dog's nose.

Happy Halloween! The model and actress, 21, got into character as Scooby-Doo as she arrived at the venue on the arm of her musician beau, who dressed as Shaggy for the occasion

Scooby dooby doo: Paris - the daughter of late pop icon Michael Jackson - donned a flowing layered skirt, heeled boots and a long-sleeved crop top

Gabriel wore his chest-length hair loose and teamed beige corduroy trousers with a simple green v-neck T-shirt and black boots.

The couple seemed to be having an absolute blast as they posed for a series of playful Instagram snaps inside the party.

In April, Paris hailed Gabriel the 'light of [her] life' in an Instagram post to mark their first anniversary.

Alongside several pictures of the pair, including snaps of them locking lips and playing music together, she wrote: 'You're the light of my life. thank you for making me the happiest and luckiest girl in the world.

Beauty: Paris' brunette hair was worn in freshly blow dried curls and black paint was applied to her nose to recreate the look of a dog's nose

Photobooth: Paris' party featured a photo booth that super-imposed a picture of her face on each of the photos taken inside

Much-loved: Paris and Gabriel dressed up as cartoon characters Shaggy and Scooby Doo

'Happy anniversary baby can't wait for another trip around the sun.'

It was previously claimed that Gabriel was a hit with Paris' friends and family because he is 'super supportive and understanding' of her.

An insider said: 'He's a musician and they play together in a band. [They've been together] for several months and he is super supportive and understanding about how hard the last few weeks have been for Paris.'

The source also called the rock star a 'constant' in Paris' life, saying she 'needs him right now'.

Shaggy: Gabriel wore his chest-length hair loose and teamed beige corduroy trousers with a simple green T-shirt and shiny black boots

Fun: In April, Paris hailed Gabriel the 'light of [her] life' in an Instagram post to mark their first anniversary

It was recently claimed the couple's band Soundflowers are on the verge of signing a major record deal.

A source said: 'Paris is really focused on her music and it's given her a lot of comfort.

'She and Gabriel have grown their following and a handful of big labels have shown interest in offering them a deal, including Universal.

'There is a lot of pressure on her because of who she is, but she just wants to have fun with it.
